person.persName: Thomas R. Oliver, Jr. (Fleming County, Kentucky, laborer)

body.p: Fleming County, Kentucky, laborer. Kentucky native. Son of Ambrose Oliver and Sarah Kennan Oliver. Resident of Fleming County in 1850. Laborer in Fleming County in 1860.

bibl.p: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Fleming County, Poplar Plains, p. 335. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Fleming County, District 2, p. 10. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Morgan County, Hamptons Mill, p. 5.
